data.title: B Link to Mid Info / Support Haunt Lineup
data.description: Use this Haunt to support your teammates as they fight for Mid Control, or to scan for enemy players when your team could benefit from gathering info in Mid.

data.title: B Site Retake / Site Hold Haunt Lineup from B Link
data.description: Here's a very effective B Site retake / site hold Haunt lineup from B Link, that can reveal players behind smokes and in key positions to set your teammates up for easy picks on Site.

data.title: Mid Doors Prowler + Haunt Combo for Mid and Shops
data.description: Here's a great early round Prowler + Haunt combo that not only gathers important information in Shops for your team, but also creates opportunities for you and your team to get picks in Mid.
